title: Algeria : economic growth forecast at 4.1% in 2026
description:
Algeria : economic growth forecast at 4.1% in 2026

According to the 2026 Finance Bill presented by Minister Abdelkrim Bouzred, Algeria’s economy is expected to grow by 4.1% in 2026 and 4.4% in 2027. GDP will reach DZD 41,878.3 billion in 2026, supported by the non-hydrocarbon sector at DZD 36,286.5...

title: Central Banker Report Cards 2025: Africa
description:

title: Algeria floats first $2.3bn Sukuk as fiscal pressures mount
description:
Algeria will issue its first-ever sovereign sukuk worth 297 billion dinars ($2.3 billion) as the government moves to unlock fresh funding to plug a widening budget deficit and expand financing options beyond hydrocarbons.

According to a Finance Ministry document cited by Bloomberg on Monday, the Is...
